title: sreyash3105/personal-multi-llm-os
summary: A local-first, privacy-preserving AI assistant that runs entirely on your own machine — no cloud, no API keys, no external data sharing.  This system acts as a desktop AI OS with a code pipeline, study mode, multimodal chat, vision AI, per-profile memory, tools runtime, and an observability dashboard — all powered by local LLMs via Ollama.
